posts.summary:
Day by day, waking up positive.
Step by step, getting better at everything I do.
Thought by thought, letting in everything I...
posts.body: Day by day, waking up positive. Step by step, getting better at everything I do. Thought by thought, letting in everything I ever denied. Action by action, performing with love. Becoming everything I never dared to be. Unfolding my soul. Spinning towards my infinite potential.

posts.summary: Blissful in injury
posts.title: Blissful in injury
posts.body:
I am unable to train due to a recent injury, but it’s okay. I feel fucking great! I am positive and infinitely thankful for all the training I’ve had up until now. The time off will give me new perspectives, stronger drive and deeper focus. Just with these thoughts in my head, I can feel my body healing. Pushing my thoughts through portals of positivity.

I close my eyes and see myself sitting on the mat again. It gets me inspired. It makes me happy. But above all, it makes it real. I am in control of my future.

posts.summary: nodejs http listen port 80 without sudo using iptables
posts.title: nodejs http listen port 80 without sudo using iptables
posts.body:
With iptables you can e.g. redirect TCP requests on port 80 to a different port. The reason this comes in handy is that listening on port numbers below 1000 requires elevated permissions on Linux.

sudo iptables -t nat -I PREROUTING -p tcp --dport 80 -j REDIRECT --to-port 8080
  • sudo to run iptables with elevated permissions.
  • -t table to insert new rule
  • -I insert this rule before all other rules in the chain
  • -p protocol
  • --dport source port
  • -j jump to target
  • --to-port destination port

If this problem made you run your scripts with sudo, now you can stop that.

Source: http://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/linux-port-redirection-with-iptables/

posts.summary: Falling in and out of truth and illusion. The pendulum is speeding up the closer I get. The frequency is increasing. Good and...
posts.body:
Falling in and out of truth and illusion. The pendulum is speeding up the closer I get. The frequency is increasing. Good and bad flying by ever more freely. The less I judge the faster it flows.

It’s me accepting me. It’s us accepting us. Preparing to accept infinity.

posts.summary: All I do is win
posts.title: All I do is win
posts.body: I have submitted to the fact that my opponent is teaching me where I’m weak. When I am not afraid of failing, all I do is succeed.
